subject: Football
lead_paragraph: They have played each other 54 times since 1928, Sunday’s N.F.C. championship game was only the second between the Packers and Giants in Green Bay, Wis., with a title at stake.
snippet: They have played each other 54 times since 1928, Sunday’s N.F.C. championship game was only the second between the Packers and Giants in Green Bay, Wis., with a title at stake.
